A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I liked The Force Awakens\, even though it was a play by play rehash of A New Hope. I did not like The Last Jedi. Luke's character is totally wasted\, as is the entire Fin/Rose sub plot. Many plot points from the Force Awakens are entirely abandoned\, leaving me uninterested for the next installment. The Force Awakens left me feeling excited for the future of Starwars. This film made me feel like there is no future for starwars.
